hypothesis_content.title: BTC 20/50 EMA Golden Cross Momentum Acceleration
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a NEUTRAL regime and forms a 20-period EMA crossing above 50-period EMA on 4H timeframe, the subsequent 24-hour price momentum will exceed the average 24-hour momentum of the previous 5 EMA cross events by at least 25%.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In neutral regimes, EMA crossovers signal emerging trends before full bull confirmation. The 4H timeframe filters noise while 20/50 EMA provides optimal sensitivity for medium-term momentum. Volume confirmation reduces false signals.
entry_conditions: Volume on crossover candle > 20-period volume average

exit_conditions.take_profit: 7.5% gain from entry OR 72 hours elapsed
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 3.2% loss from entry OR 20-EMA crosses back below 50-EMA

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If average 24-hour post-crossover returns across 10+ signals fail to exceed historical average by 15% OR win rate < 55% with profit factor < 1.4
